content:
Whyte, Angus Results of the Digital Curation Centre 2014 RDM Survey Pre-\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdrelease Briefing 2, <p>The 2nd of 3 Briefing papers giving results of the DCC survey, originally released to survey respondents on 1st May 2014. The report outlines:</p> <p>How far have institutions progressed towards developing RDM policy?</p> <p>How far have institutions got in implementing their policies?</p> <p>When will institutions be able to provide for long-term access?</p> <p>What external guidance and support is needed now?</p> <p>What shared services are appropriate?</p> Research data management, UK, universities, institutions; 2014-06-30
    http://zenodo.org/record/10712/files/DCC_RDM2014_SurveyAnalysis_Pre2.pdf; http://zenodo.org/record/10712/files/DCC_RDM2014_SurveyAnalysis_Pre2.png?subformat=icon-90;
Imported from Invenio.
